name: Spinach Pinwheels
author: BDEGER
summary: Here's a great looking and great tasting appetizer. It's easy, too! You can substitute any flavor of cheese spread for garlic herb.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) package garlic herb cheese spread
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Split crescent dough in half along center perforation
Spread with 1/4 of the cheese spread and sprinkle with spinach
Starting with long side, roll dough up, rolling back and forth several times to seal edges
Cut into 3/4 inch slices (about 15 slices per roll)
Arrange the slices one inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet
Continue making the crescent roll ups until all of the ingredients are used
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until lightly browned
Serve immediately or keep warm on a warming tray
